name: Diehard
summary: Die at dying 5, rather than dying 4.
description:
It takes more to kill you than most. You die from the dying condition at dying 5, rather than dying 4.Diehard Leads To...

Numb to DeathTraitsGeneral: A type of feat that any character can select, regardless of ancestry and class, as long as they meet the prerequisites. You can select a feat with this trait when your class grants a general feat.
